data.text:
Proxima Nova

Sans Serif

Examples of websites using Proxima Nova typeface. Proxima Nova is a sans-serif font designed by Mark Simonson Studio. It has a balanced and modern design, with a total of 120 individual styles including 12 weights and matching italics to suit various design needs.
